( 10000     )      :    ,     :       :       :  ,     ,               : ,  ..       -                         ,   24 .        ,           .     16    (    )  -------------------------------------                   ,      ()  A1-   A2-  2  B1-   B2-  2  C1-             -------------------------------------  Why do you constantly miss the opportunity to learn French?   There is a way to tighten French using time that you did not know about! How? Just using your phone lock. How it works? The moment you use your phone, your attention is focused only on the screen and you are ready to receive new information. It is at this point that WordBit turns its attention to itself and helps you learn French. Each time you check the phone, you lose valuable time and use it in vain!   WordBit English  http://bit.ly/enruwordbit  WordBit German  http://bit.ly/deruwordbit  WordBit Spanish  http://bit.ly/esruwordbit  WordBit Hebrew  http://bit.ly/wordbitheru  WordBit Arabic  http://bit.ly/arruwordbit  WordBit Korean  http://bit.ly/krruwordbit  Features of this app   Innovative lock-based learning method  When you read messages, watch YouTube, or just check the time, you can learn dozens of new words and phrases. In a month you can go through more than 1000 words and phrases!   Optimized content for screen lock  WordBit provides perfect-sized content that is suitable for locking the screen. Therefore, from this moment on, training will take only a couple of seconds and will not interfere with your daily life.   Useful examples  With examples of sentences, you can find out how words are used in real life and with what words they are combined.   Word categories are organized by level  You can learn words and phrases appropriate for your level. (Over 10,000 words from beginner to advanced)   Additional information  Antonyms Nouns: articles are distributed by color, there are plural forms Verbs: a concise and complete version of conjugation tables Adjectives: comparative and superior Grammar Tips: Irregular Verbs, Irregular Articles  Well-organized, rich content   Examples You can learn with frequently used sentences.  Different categories: idioms, proverbs, etc.  Images for beginners  Pronunciation - Automatic pronunciation and accent marks  Extremely useful features for users   Quiz and slide mode  Daily repeat function You can repeat as many words as you want 24 hours.  Personalized word classification You can mark a word that you already know and remove it from your learning list.  Search function  16 different color themes (there are themes on a dark background)  ------------------------------------- Content Provided  Word with pictures for beginners  Numbers and numbers  Animals and plants  food  Family, friends  Other  Word (levels)   A1-Entry Level  A2-Entry Level 2  B1-Intermediate  B2-Intermediate Level 2  C1-Advanced   Phrases and Expressions   Basis  For travel  Health ------------------------------------- Word beat
